summary: All four requirements are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 (doctor assignment dropdown) is implemented in AppointmentCard.tsx with useGetStaffByRole('Doctor') and useAssignDoctorToAppointment, plus backend support in main.mo and migration.mo. REQ-2 (Next Appointment widget today-only filter) is implemented in NextAppointmentWidget.tsx with isSameDay filtering and 'No Appointment For Today' text. REQ-3 (calendar resize via CSS) is implemented in index.css with explicit rdp class overrides. REQ-4 (Staff role option) is implemented in PermissionsMatrix.tsx with 'Staff' added to ROLE_OPTIONS.
